components.title: What community benefits do you expect to deliver with this project?

components.name: lgfiGB
components.title: Tell us about these benefits in detail, and how the asset's activities will help deliver them
components.hint: Include how you gathered feedback from local people on which activities to run, and how each will address a specific community need

components.name: zKKouR
components.title: Explain how you plan to deliver and sustain these benefits over time
components.hint: Include the key milestones you intend to meet in order to deliver these benefits.

components.name: ZyIQGI
components.title: Tell us how you'll make sure the whole community benefits from the asset
components.hint:
For example, people who have not used the asset in the past, and other people who live in the local area.

Where possible, reference any data you have on protected characteristics and equality impacts.

lists.title: What community benefits do you expect to deliver with this project
lists.name: oizZTG

items.text: Community pride and perceptions of the local area as a place to live
Social trust, cohesion and a sense of belonging
Participation in community life, arts and culture, or sport
Local economic outcomes, such as employment and volunteering opportunities, and employability and skills
Delivering positive impact in physical and mental health, and reducing loneliness and isolation

name: Apply for funding to save an asset in your community
